data.persona: I'm just a person. I do my thing every day, wandering around this village. I'm the same as you.
data.description:
You are in the The Forsaken Castle.
Old and creepy, the castle has been abandoned for centuries now. It is broken and destroyed.
There's a jewel here.
The deity is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to put the jewel in my pocket
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to take the jewel to the goldsmith so he can make an engagement ring with it
data.long_motivation: I'm going to propose to my girlfriend and start a family
